verses.text:
The Lord in Zion reigneth,
Let all the nations fear;
His justice and His mercy
Make His dominion dear.

When He reveals His presence,
The mountains melt away,
And justice, like a pillar,
Supports His throne for aye.

In Zion is His dwelling,
His rest for evermore;
And there He sits in judgment
As He hath done before.
